author: lofwyr
msg: 1. TobagoConfig as simple abstract class (part of the API)
3. TobagoConfigFragment which is used while the library setup, to build one config from multiple tobago-config.xml files. (internal)
- Ordering of the configurations (similar to JSF 2.0)
- prevent stacktrace in the current log files at startup (validating schema)

author: stefan2
msg: Eliminate unnecessary integer conversions in cache-inprocess.c.
All sizes and size-like values should be unsigned as well.
(inprocess_cache_t): use apr_uint64_t counters instead of apr_int64_t

author: andy
msg: Final alignment of ARQ codebase and old SourceForge code base.
